    • Constructor Detail

      • CodeCoverageTracker

        public CodeCoverageTracker(List<Class<?>> coverageInstrumentedClasses)
        Creates a coverage tracker that tracks the classes specified in the given list. The list can be null, which is equivalent to an empty list.

      • generationStepPost

        public void generationStepPost(ExecutableSequence es)
        Description copied from interface: IEventListener
        Called by the AbstractGenerator during each generation iteration, immediately after a generation step() has completed.
        Specified by:
        generationStepPost in interface IEventListener
        Parameters:
        es - sequence that was generated and executed in the last generation step. Can b null, which means the last step was unable to generate a sequence (e.g. due to a bad random choice).
        See Also:
        AbstractGenerator

      • progressThreadUpdate

        public void progressThreadUpdate()
        Description copied from interface: IEventListener
        Called by ProgressDisplay at regular intervals to monitor progress. Implementing classes can use this opportunity to update state.

        See Also:
